name: Connect 4D
description:
DO NOT ENTER FULL-SCREEN UNTIL YOU START THE FIRST LEVEL! I don't know how to fix this bug, but the level is always offset  :/

Welcome to Connect 4D! (I hope I don't get in trouble for that name lol) The objective is to connect four in a row to gain a point, after which they will disappear in a Candy Crush-like fashion. This game has 4-directional gravity, so try to use this strategically!

I like this game because it is a simple concept and easy to grasp, but it takes a while to get old. It feels like a classic board game!

Tools used:

Godot Engine 3.1.1

Krita 4.1.1

bfxr.net

Everything besides the sound effects was created from scratch by me. Hope you enjoy!
